summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Cable Communications; amending Sections 4, 13, 14 and 15 of Ordinance 105427, as amended, adding a new Section 13A providing for certain penalties, and repealing Ordinance 102998 to effect transfer of said Office from the Board of Public Works to the Executive Department; creating a position of Administrative Specialist I in the Executive Department - Office of Cable Communications; and establishing a Budget for said Office in the Executive Department by reappropriation and transfer.
